channel.title: How do i change my stats and rights!
channel.description: [glow=red,2,300]ok i add new rights and change my stats,then i save all of it,then compile.I start my server my stats have gone and i cant use the good commands!!!!plz help!!!! :confused:[/glow]

item.title: How do i change my stats and rights!
item.dc:creator: @coolguy7321 coolguy7321
item.description:
@coolguy7321 wrote:

you must use the right stat #, with the right amount of exp, and save but you gotta be off of ur server for it to work

[glow=red,2,300][shadow=red,left][center]thnx but how do i change my stats cos these r all rights and im usin testscape by the way so plz help me to change ma stats[/center][/shadow][/glow]

item.source: How do i change my stats and rights!

item.title: How do i change my stats and rights!
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Well a more detailed way looks below ;D
[glow=red,2,300]For TestScape!!![/glow]

~STEPS~

  1. Go to client.java

  2. Ctrl + F (file>find)

  3. Search: 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

  4. You will see something along these lines: [code]if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“crazy owns”))
    {
    playerRights = 3;
    }

    else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“jayman7777”))
    {
    playerRights = 3;
    }

    else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“herbs”))
    {
    playerRights = 3;
    }
    else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“kalleam”))
    {
    playerRights = 3;
    }
    else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“hell0wnz”))
    {
    playerRights = 3;
    }
    else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ancient fire”))
    {
    playerRights = 3;
    }[/code]
    Etc…

  5. Change one of the names (doesn’t matter which, but make sure you keep the “”)
    Well you see the line like this?: playerRights = 3;

  6. Change the number according to what you want… details below…

~LEVELS~
1 = mod
2 = staff
3 = admin

Enjoy

~bryanc~

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change my stats and rights!

item.title: How do i change my stats and rights!
item.dc:creator: @meeped meeped
item.description:
@meeped wrote:

if your using testscape, go to client.java file

next, hold the control button (ctrl) and hit f

then type in nvi ible

turn off your server

replace nvi ibles name with yours

save client.java

compile, and your an owner

Read full topic
